languages.text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy he sees no farther than {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells from the Mastiff. It immediately dashes to them and performs a special attack that deals twice as much Rending damage and provokes TOU Save −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}. On a failure, it applies Prone for 1 round.
Using Jump! interrupts the effect of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy he sees no farther than {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells from the Mastiff. It immediately dashes to them and performs a special attack that deals twice as much Rending damage and provokes TOU Save −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}. On a failure, it applies Prone for 1 round.
Using Jump! interrupts the effect of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells of the cyber-mastiff. The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and performs a special attack. The target suffers double {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает врага в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} в {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} клетках от кибермастифа. Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому врагу и совершает особую атаку. Враг получат двойной {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинутым{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} снимает эффекты способностей {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Взять!{/g} и {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Охранять!{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their line of sight within {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells from the cyber-mastiff. The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and makes a special attack. The target suffers double rending damage and must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall prone for 1 round.
This ability removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells of the cyber-mastiff. The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and performs a special attack. The target suffers double {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.
This ability removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

The target suffers double {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.
This ability removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells of the cyber-mastiff. The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and performs a special attack. This ability removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunan ve siber mastife en fazla {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} hücre uzaktaki bir düşmanı seçer. Siber mastif, anında o düşmana doğru atılır ve özel bir saldırı gerçekleştirir. Hedef, iki katı {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}yırtma hasarına{/g} maruz kalır ve −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Göz Hapsine Al!{/g} ve {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Koru!{/g} kabiliyetlerinin etkilerini ortadan kaldırır.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells of the cyber-mastiff. The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and performs a special attack. The target suffers double {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
Gözetmen, görüş hattında bulunan ve siber mastife en fazla {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} hücre uzaktaki bir düşmanı seçer. Siber mastif, anında o düşmana doğru atılır ve özel bir saldırı gerçekleştirir. Hedef, iki katı yırtma hasarına maruz kalır ve −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} ceza puanına sahip bir Dayanıklılık direnç testinden geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde yere devrilir. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.
Bu kabiliyet, {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Göz Hapsine Al!{/g} ve {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Koru!{/g} kabiliyetlerinin etkilerini ortadan kaldırır.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, görüş hattında bulunan ve siber mastife en fazla {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} hücre uzaktaki bir düşmanı seçer. Siber mastif, anında o düşmana doğru atılır ve özel bir saldırı gerçekleştirir. Hedef, iki katı yırtma hasarına maruz kalır ve −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} ceza puanına sahip bir Dayanıklılık {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde yere devrilir. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.
Bu kabiliyet, {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Göz Hapsine Al!{/g} ve {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Koru!{/g} kabiliyetlerinin etkilerini ortadan kaldırır.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} elige un enemigo que esté dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} y a {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} casillas del cibermastín. El cibermastín echa a correr inmediatamente hacia ese enemigo y realiza un ataque especial. El objetivo sufre el doble de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} y debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} elimina los efectos de las capacidades {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}¡Apresa!{/g} y {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}¡Protege!{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells of the cyber-mastiff. The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and performs a special attack. The target suffers double {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
El supervisor elige un enemigo que esté dentro de su línea de visión y a {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} casillas del cibermastín. El cibermastín echa a correr inmediatamente hacia ese enemigo y realiza un ataque especial. El objetivo sufre el doble de daño acerado y debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una penalización de −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} para no quedar derribado durante 1 asalto.
Esta capacidad elimina los efectos de las capacidades {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}¡Apresa!{/g} y {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}¡Protege!{/g}.

El cibermastín echa a correr inmediatamente hacia ese enemigo y realiza un ataque especial. El objetivo sufre el doble de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} y debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} durante 1 asalto.
Esta capacidad elimina los efectos de las capacidades {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}¡Apresa!{/g} y {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}¡Protege!{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的一名敌人，该名敌人与生化獒犬的距离不能超过{uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}格。随后，生化獒犬立刻冲向敌人，进行特殊攻击。目标会承受双倍{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}，同时需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会移除{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}逮捕！{/g}与{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守护！{/g}能力的效果。

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells of the cyber-mastiff. The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and performs a special attack. The target suffers double {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
监察官选择视线范围内的一名敌人，该名敌人与生化獒犬的距离不能超过{uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}格。随后，生化獒犬立刻冲向敌人，进行特殊攻击。目标会承受双倍撕裂伤害，同时需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入倒地状态，持续一轮。
此能力会移除{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}逮捕！{/g}与{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守护！{/g}能力的效果。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的一名敌人，该名敌人与生化獒犬的距离不能超过{uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}格。随后，生化獒犬立刻冲向敌人，进行特殊攻击。目标会承受双倍{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}，同时需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一轮。
此能力会移除{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}逮捕！{/g}与{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守护！{/g}能力的效果。

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt einen Gegner in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtfeld{/g} innerhalb von {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} Feldern um den Cyber-Mastiff. Der Cyber-Mastiff stürzt sich sofort auf den Gegner und führt einen Spezialangriff durch. Das Ziel erleidet doppelten {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g} und muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} bestehen, sonst wird es für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} entfernt die Effekte der Fähigkeiten {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Fass!{/g} und {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Beschütze!{/g}.

The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and performs a special attack. The target suffers double {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seinem Sichtfeld innerhalb von {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} Feldern um den Cyber-Mastiff. Der Cyber-Mastiff stürzt sich sofort auf den Gegner und führt einen Spezialangriff durch. Das Ziel erleidet doppelten rüstungsbrechenden Schaden und muss eine Zähigkeit-Widerstandsprobe mit einem Abzug von −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} bestehen, sonst wird es für 1 Runde hingestreckt.
Diese Fähigkeit entfernt die Effekte der Fähigkeiten {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Fass!{/g} und {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Beschütze!{/g}.

Diese Fähigkeit entfernt die Effekte der Fähigkeiten {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Fass!{/g} und {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Beschütze!{/g}.

Das Ziel erleidet doppelten {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g} und muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} bestehen, sonst wird es für 1 Runde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
Diese Fähigkeit entfernt die Effekte der Fähigkeiten {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Fass!{/g} und {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Beschütze!{/g}.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} désigne un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} situé dans un rayon de {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cases du cyber-mastiff, qui se rue immédiatement vers lui et inflige une attaque spéciale. La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts de lacération{/g} doublés et doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de -{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} supprime les effets des capacités {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Appréhende !{/g} et {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protège !{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells of the cyber-mastiff. The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and performs a special attack. The target suffers double {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
Le surveillant désigne un ennemi dans sa ligne de mire situé dans un rayon de {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cases du cyber-mastiff, qui se rue immédiatement vers lui et inflige une attaque spéciale. La cible subit des dégâts de lacération doublés et doit réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec une pénalité de -{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet Paralysie pendant 1 round.
Cette capacité supprime les effets des capacités {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Appréhende !{/g} et {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protège !{/g}.

Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} désigne un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} situé dans un rayon de {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cases du cyber-mastiff, qui se rue immédiatement vers lui et inflige une attaque spéciale. La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts de lacération{/g} doublés et doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de -{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 round.
Cette capacité supprime les effets des capacités {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Appréhende !{/g} et {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protège !{/g}.

Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} désigne un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} situé dans un rayon de {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cases du cyber-mastiff, qui se rue immédiatement vers lui et inflige une attaque spéciale. La cible subit des {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts de lacération{/g} doublés et doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de -{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 round.
Cette capacité supprime les effets des capacités {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Appréhende !{/g} et {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protège !{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}はサイバーマスチフの{uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}セル以内の{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の中にいる敵を選択する。サイバーマスチフはその敵に即座に突進し、特殊攻撃を行う。ターゲットは2倍の{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を受け、−{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受け、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}捕まえろ！{/g}と{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守れ！{/g}のアビリティの効果を取り除く。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells of the cyber-mastiff. The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and performs a special attack. The target suffers double {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
監督者はサイバーマスチフの{uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}セル以内の視線の中にいる敵を選択する。サイバーマスチフはその敵に即座に突進し、特殊攻撃を行う。ターゲットは2倍の裂傷ダメージを受け、−{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}のペナルティで耐久力抵抗判定を受け、失敗すると1ラウンドの間脆弱化する。
このアビリティは{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}捕まえろ！{/g}と{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守れ！{/g}のアビリティの効果を取り除く。

監督者はサイバーマスチフの{uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}セル以内の視線の中にいる敵を選択する。サイバーマスチフはその敵に即座に突進し、特殊攻撃を行う。ターゲットは2倍の裂傷ダメージを受け、−{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840}のペナルティで耐久力抵抗判定を受け、失敗すると1ラウンドの間脆弱化する。
このアビリティは{g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}捕まえろ！{/g}と{g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}守れ！{/g}のアビリティの効果を取り除く。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает врага в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} в {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} клетках от кибермастифа. Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому врагу и совершает особую атаку. Враг получат двойной {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинутым{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} снимает эффекты способностей {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Взять!{/g} и {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Охранять!{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} cells of the cyber-mastiff. The cyber-mastiff immediately dashes to that enemy and performs a special attack. The target suffers double {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} removes the effects of the {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Apprehend!{/g} and {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
Надзиратель выбирает врага в зоне видимости в {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} клетках от кибермастифа. Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому врагу и совершает особую атаку. Враг получат двойной раздирающий урон, выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} и в случае провала оказывается опрокинутым на 1 раунд.
Эта способность снимает эффекты способностей {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Взять!{/g} и {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Охранять!{/g}.

Надзиратель выбирает врага в зоне видимости в {uip|Range|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} клетках от кибермастифа. Кибермастиф немедленно бежит к этому врагу и совершает особую атаку. Враг получат двойной раздирающий урон, выполняет проверку Выносливости на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|Save|f43988eb304d448db74237fcc605f840} и в случае провала оказывается опрокинутым на 1 раунд.
Эта способность снимает эффекты способностей {g|f:3311f1213a1e452c874ce2cde5c03f59}Взять!{/g} и {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Охранять!{/g}.
